name: GHGEmissionsScope1
description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned or controlled sources

name: GHGEmissionsScope2
description: Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from purchased energy

name: GHGEmissionsScope3
description: Other indirect greenhouse gas emissions in value chain

name: CarbonIntensity
description: Carbon emissions per unit of revenue or production

name: EnergyConsumption
description: Total energy consumption within the organization

name: RenewableEnergyPercentage
description: Percentage of energy consumption from renewable sources

name: EnergyIntensity
description: Energy consumption per unit of activity or revenue

name: WaterConsumption
description: Total water consumption by the organization

name: WaterStressAreas
description: Water consumption in water-stressed areas

name: WasteGenerated
description: Total weight of waste generated

name: WasteRecycled
description: Percentage of waste diverted from disposal through recycling

name: HazardousWaste
description: Total weight of hazardous waste generated

name: BiodiversityImpact
description: Significant impacts on biodiversity in protected areas

name: LandUse
description: Total land area owned, leased, or managed for production activities

name: AirEmissions
description: Air emissions of pollutants (NOx, SOx, particulates)

name: EmployeeTurnover
description: Total number and rates of new employee hires and employee turnover

name: EmployeeBenefits
description: Benefits provided to full-time employees

name: BoardDiversity
description: Diversity of governance bodies and employees by gender, age, minority groups

name: GenderPayGap
description: Ratio of basic salary and remuneration of women to men

name: WomenInLeadership
description: Percentage of women in leadership positions

name: WorkplaceInjuries
description: Work-related injuries and injury rates

name: OccupationalDiseases
description: Work-related ill health and occupational diseases

name: SafetyTraining
description: Workers covered by occupational health and safety management system

name: EmployeeTraining
description: Average hours of training per year per employee

name: SkillsDevelopment
description: Programs for upgrading employee skills and transition assistance

name: HumanRightsAssessment
description: Operations subject to human rights reviews or impact assessments

name: ChildLaborRisk
description: Operations and suppliers at significant risk for child labor

name: CommunityEngagement
description: Operations with local community engagement and development programs

name: LocalSuppliers
description: Proportion of spending on local suppliers

name: DataSecurity
description: Description of approach to identifying and addressing data security risks

name: CustomerPrivacy
description: Number of data breaches and customers affected

name: BoardIndependence
description: Percentage of independent board members

name: BoardMeetings
description: Number of board meetings per year and attendance rates

name: ExecutiveCompensation
description: Annual total compensation ratio and percentage increase

name: AntiCorruption
description: Operations assessed for risks related to corruption

name: EthicsTraining
description: Communication and training about anti-corruption policies

name: LegalCompliance
description: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior and violations

name: ClimateRiskGovernance
description: Board oversight of climate-related risks and opportunities

name: RiskManagementProcess
description: Processes for identifying, assessing and managing climate-related risks

name: SupplierAssessment
description: New suppliers screened using environmental and social criteria

name: SupplierAudits
description: Suppliers assessed for environmental and social impacts

name: ESGReporting
description: Publication of sustainability reports and ESG disclosures

name: StakeholderEngagement
description: Stakeholder groups engaged and key topics raised

name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
description: Customer satisfaction metric measuring likelihood to recommend company to others

name: Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR)
description: Safety metric measuring frequency of workplace injuries resulting in lost time

name: EBITA Margin
description: Earnings Before Interest Taxes and Amortization as percentage of revenue

name: Digital Learning Hours
description: Average hours of digital training per employee per year

name: Customer Avoided Emissions
description: CO2 emissions avoided by customers through use of company products/services

name: Carbon Neutral Operations
description: Target year and progress toward achieving carbon neutral operations

name: Digital Twin Implementation
description: Use of digital twin technology in operations and products

name: Water Strategy Implementation
description: Percentage of locations with implemented water management strategy

name: Patent Portfolio Sustainability
description: Percentage of patents related to sustainability/SDGs

name: R&D Intensity
description: Research and Development expenses as percentage of revenue

name: Scope 1 Emissions
description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned/controlled sources

name: Scope 2 Emissions
description: Indirect emissions from purchased electricity/energy

name: Scope 3 Emissions
description: Indirect emissions from value chain activities

name: EU Taxonomy Alignment
description: Percentage of revenue/CapEx/OpEx aligned with EU Taxonomy

name: Circular Economy Initiatives
description: Programs and metrics related to circular economy implementation

name: Supply Chain Risk Assessment
description: Evaluation and management of ESG risks in supply chain

name: Cybersecurity Incidents
description: Number and severity of cybersecurity breaches/incidents

name: Employee Retention Rate
description: Percentage of employees retained over specific time period

name: Diversity Ratio
description: Percentage representation of diverse groups in workforce/leadership

name: Smart Meter Deployment
description: Number of smart energy meters installed

name: Renewable Energy Integration
description: Percentage of renewable energy in operations/grid

name: ESG Sustainability Index
description: Internal composite index measuring ESG performance

name: Management Compensation ESG Link
description: Percentage of executive compensation tied to ESG metrics

name: Productivity Improvement
description: Percentage increase in operational productivity

name: Energy Consumption Reduction
description: Percentage reduction in energy consumption over time
